data.title: Courses: Academics: The Media School: Indiana University Bloomington
data.meta_description: The Media School offers rich and diverse courses tailored to your pursuit of degrees, concentrations and specializations.
data.text:
The Media School offers rich and diverse courses tailored to your pursuit of degrees, concentrations and specializations.

This page lists some of the courses that have been offered at The Media School, though not all are available every semester. For the most accurate information about courses offered in The Media School, please visit the College Bulletin. See the IU Schedule of Classes for listings of courses offered during specific semesters.
